name: Soul Harvest (itch)
description:
Soul Harvest is a top-down action game in which you much sacrifice the people of  villages you pass through to gain power. You can use this power for powerful abilities that can be augmented through the sacrifice system at the end of each level.

Controls:

- WASD to move around

- L Mouse for melee

- R Mouse, E, Shift, Q for skills

- CTRL to sacrifice health and empower attacks

- F to toggle fullscreen
